archimate:BusinessObject.name: (ref) Customer eBOM (ATBB)
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: The customer eBOM, in the case of H/C, will be generally specific to an instance of H/C, but in some cases, if the customer is requiring a fleet of identical H/C, this customer eBOM can be a template for several A/C. --- This customer eBOM will be used as a master for the mBOM and the sBOM.
